titles.title: For the relief of the estate of Gail E. Dobert.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 104-813.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 11.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Sensenbrenner the House passed over the measure without prejudice.

bill.summary: 9/4/1996--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the estate of a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States in connection with her death an amount which shall be: (1) equal to twice the individual's gross annual pay at the time of her death; and (2) exempt from income taxes.
